mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE id = #{id} order by r_seq desc
mapper.insert: insert into reservation(r_seq,id,r_date,r_name,r_people,r_price) values((select ifnull(max(r_seq) + 1,1) from reservation b), #{id}, #{r_date}, #{r_name}, #{r_people},#{r_price});
mapper.update: update tbluser set email=#{email}, password=#{password} where id=#{id};
